data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Gandharah
data.detailed_description:
Travel to fantastical and exotic places with this new pack from Ayato Sound Create. Featuring Eastern instruments blended with modern synthetic textures and percussion evoke far off visions of every day life, temples, bazaars, deserts, palaces and more.

* 20 Songs for royalty-free use
* OGG and MP3 formats included
* Music for many places and events including deserts, palaces, temples, daily life, and more!
* For use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

1 - Temple
2 - Nation
3 - Daily Life
4 - Far East
5 - The King
6 - Back Street
7 - Shrine Maiden
8 - Reincarnation
9 - Night
10 - Castle Town
11 - Thief's Song
12 - Secret Art
13 - Desert
14 - Musk
15 - Abyss
16 - Regret
17 - Merchant
18 - Palace
19 - Phobia
20 - Primitive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
